sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他遇到了许多困难，他的活力从未消退。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他遇到了許多困難，他的活力從未消退。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tā yùdàole xǔduō kùnnán, tā de huólì cóng wèi xiāotuì.
sentences.translation: Despite facing many difficulties, his energy has never faded.

sentences.pinyin: zhè gè rén chōng mǎn le huó lì。
sentences.translation: This person is full of vigor.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管她年纪大了，但她仍然有像年轻人那样的活力。
sentences.traditionalText: 盡管她年紀大了，但她仍然有像年輕人那樣的活力。
sentences.pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā nián jì dà le, dàn tā réng rán yǒu xiàng nián qīng rén nà yàng de huó lì。
sentences.translation: Despite her age, she still has the vigor of a young person.
